text: (tinkling)
(playful music)

♪ 'Twas a sunny day when I
went to play down by the sea ♪
♪ I climbed aboard a pirate ship ♪
♪ And the captain said to me ♪

♪ We're going this way, that
way, forwards, backwards ♪

♪ Up and down, up and down,
over the deep blue sea ♪

♪ 'Twas a windy day when I
went to play down by the sea ♪
♪ I climbed aboard a pirate ship ♪
♪ And the captain said to me ♪

♪ We're going this way, that
way, forwards, backwards ♪

♪ Up and down, up and down,
over the deep blue sea ♪

♪ 'Twas a rainy day when I
went to play down by the sea ♪
♪ I climbed aboard a pirate ship ♪
♪ And the captain said to me ♪

♪ We're going this way, that
way, forwards, backwards ♪

♪ Up and down, up and down,
over the deep blue sea ♪

♪ 'Twas a snowy day when I
went to play down by the sea ♪
♪ I climbed aboard a pirate ship ♪
♪ And the captain said to me ♪

♪ We're going this way, that
way, forwards, backwards ♪

♪ Up and down, up and down,
over the deep blue sea ♪

♪ 'Twas a stormy day when I
went to play down by the sea ♪
♪ I climbed aboard a pirate ship ♪
♪ And the captain said to me ♪

♪ We're going this way, that
way, forwards, backwards ♪

♪ Up and down, up and down,
over the deep blue sea ♪

♪ This way, that way,
forwards, backwards ♪

♪ Up and down, up and down,
over the deep blue sea ♪

♪ This way, that way,
forwards, backwards ♪

♪ Up and down, up and down,
over the deep blue sea ♪
